app_description: AI Translate Camera Translator with artificial intelligence This app is: AI Translator AI Voice AR Camera AI Translate with Video Translator photo translator voice translator and text translator Translate voice video text with AI using AR Translation and Language Camera translator Translate everything with your AI Translate camera translator app with AI Voice and AI Text translate conversation translate voice translate text translate documents translate and interprets environments landscapes and anything recognize humans object texts materials etc.. Augmented Reality and a precise translation engine in a single AI Translator and AR Camera with document translator AI Translate Camera Translator with AI Voice and AI Text allows you to have a conversation in another language and see the translated subtitles at the bottom of the screen in real time. Use it with smart AR glasses and travel understanding anyone you are looking at. You are using the most complete voice translator document translator photo translator and video translator in one app. The world of translated conversation is revolutionized with AR Translate Augmented Reality with artificial intelligence. It recognizes the human face the movement of the mouth and the gaze using artificial intelligence and in this way it can understand when someone is speaking to you offering a high quality language translator without interference. Translation and interpretation speed in real time with RA Camera thus achieving a total immersive translation experience. AR Camera recognition with Augmented Reality is better than a photo o camera translation these labels can be used to translate objects they are generated in space and time forever and keeping all the additional information since these labels are also interactive. Click on the button and access to the dictionary synonyms definitions voice translation and more The scene mode verifies an environment and gives you a result using in this case an object recognition tool landscapes documents etc. Recognizing landscapes and identifying complete images is possible thanks to the AI Translate Photo Translator Augmented reality AR Camera Translator These are some of the languages supported by Ar Translate Augmented Reality: Arabic English Bulgarian Catalan Simplified Chinese Traditional Chinese Croatian Czech Danish Dutch Estonian Finnish French German Greek Hebrew Hindi Hungarian Indonesian Italian Japanese Korean Lithuanian Norwegian Persian Polish Portuguese Romanian Russian Serbian Slovenian Slovak Spanish Swedish Thai Turkish Ukrainian Vietnamese and Welsh. For example you can use it like Spanish Translator or English Translator App. Subscription information: Length of Subscription: 1 month 3 day free trial or 1 year. Price: 9.99 per month billed monthly. 69.99 per year billed yearly. Subscription automatically renews unless auto renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period and identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto renewal may be turned off by going to the user s Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period if offered will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication where applicable.
